Description:
GPT-5.3-Codex is generally available to Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+. You’ll now be able to access the model in GitHub Copilot Chat on github.com, GitHub Mobile,…

The post [GPT-5.3-Codex is now available in github.com, GitHub Mobile, and Visual Studio](https://github.blog/changelog/2026-02-25-gpt-5-3-codex-is-now-available-in-github-com-github-mobile-and-visual-studio) appeared first on [The GitHub Blog](https://github.blog).
Author: Allison
Title: GPT-5.3-Codex is now available in github.com, GitHub Mobile, and Visual Studio
EnhancedContent:
GPT-5.3-Codex is generally available to Copilot Enterprise, Copilot Business, Copilot Pro, and Copilot Pro+.

You’ll now be able to access the model in GitHub Copilot Chat on github.com, GitHub Mobile, Visual Studio Code, and Visual Studio through the chat model picker. If you do not yet have access, please check again later.

## Enabling access

Copilot Business and Enterprise administrators must opt in by enabling the GPT-5.3-Codex policy in Copilot settings. Once enabled, users in that organization will see **GPT-5.3-Codex** in the model picker.

To learn more about the models available in Copilot, see [our documentation on models](https://docs.github.com/copilot/reference/ai-models/supported-models?utm_source=model-release-announcement&utm_medium=changelog&utm_campaign=newmodels) and get started with Copilot today.

## Share your feedback

Join the [GitHub Community](https://github.com/orgs/community/discussions/categories/copilot-conversations?utm_source=model-release-announcement&utm_medium=changelog&utm_campaign=newmodels) to share your feedback.
